translated: Then, one of the disciples who has the form of Vairocana and so on should hold the ends of the five threads.

original: slob dpon @267b gyis kyang sna lnga nas bzung la bsnyams te /
analyzed: slob dpon @267b gyis kyang sna lnga nas bzung la bsnyams te /
translated: The master also takes hold of the five-colored thread and equalizes it.

original: 'ju ra bu dang mdud pa med par byas la /
analyzed: 'ju ra bu dang mdud pa med par byas la /
translated: He makes it without knots and without joints.🔽He recites:

original: aom chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug / chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug / chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: aom chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug / chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug / chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste //
translated: “Om. All phenomena are engaged in the subsequent, all phenomena are mutually engaged, all phenomena are engaged,

original: mtha' bral rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' bral rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: and they proceed free from extremes.”

original: h'um zhes brjod de bsgrim mo //
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod de bsgrim mo //
translated: He says “hum” and tightens it.

original: bsgrims nas dri zhim po'i chus sbangs te /
analyzed: bsgrims nas dri zhim po'i chus sbangs te /
translated: Having tightened it, he soaks it in fragrant water.

original: yi ge gsum nang bsres la /
analyzed: yi ge gsum nang bsres la /
translated: He mixes the three syllables inside it.

original: gser la sogs pa snod du bzhag ste /
analyzed: gser la sogs pa snod du bzhag ste /
translated: He places it in a vessel of gold, etc.

original: me tog dang dri la sogs pas mchod la lag pas bkab ste /
analyzed: me tog dang dri la sogs pas mchod la lag pas bkab ste /
translated: He makes offerings of flowers, fragrances, etc. and covers it with his hand.

original: aom a'a: bighn'am ta krit h'um phat ces pas mang du bzlas te /
analyzed: aom a'a: bighn'am ta krit h'um phat ces pas mang du bzlas te /
translated: He recites “Om a: vignam takrit hum phat” many times.

original: de nas srad bu de rdo rje la dkris la /
analyzed: de nas srad bu de rdo rje la dkris la /
translated: Then, he wraps the thread around the vajra.

original: slob dpon bdag nyid kyis lte ba'i thad kar bzung la /
analyzed: slob dpon bdag nyid kyis lte ba'i thad kar bzung la /
translated: The master himself holds it at the level of his navel.

original: slob ma de nyid kyis lhan cig gdab bo //
analyzed: slob ma de nyid kyis lhan cig gdab bo //
translated: The disciple himself pricks it together with him.

original: 'de bas na aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
analyzed: 'de bas na aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
translated: Therefore, he recites: “Om vajra sutra samaya matrikrama hum.”

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus lags so zhes brjod cing gdab bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus lags so zhes brjod cing gdab bo //
translated: Blessed One, this is the time to benefit sentient beings.

original: des kyang sangs rgyas thams cad bskul te byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir byon par bsam mo //
analyzed: des kyang sangs rgyas thams cad bskul te byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir byon par bsam mo //
translated: And they are invited to come in order to bless the site, having been summoned by all the buddhas.

original: de la bdag cag gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni /🔽ye shes kyi thig la tshangs thig gcig tsam mam /
analyzed: de la bdag cag gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni / ye shes kyi thig la tshangs thig gcig tsam mam /
translated: In this regard, our teacher has said:🔽The wisdom thread is sufficient with just the central line,

original: tshangs thig dang zur thig tsam gyis chog par gsungs so //
analyzed: tshangs thig dang zur thig tsam gyis chog par gsungs so //
translated: or with just the central line and the corner lines.

original: gzhan dag ni phyogs thig dang rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yang bzhed do //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni phyogs thig dang rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yang bzhed do //
translated: Others maintain that it is sufficient to draw the directional lines and the vajra fence.

original: de dag gi lugs las ni /
analyzed: de dag gi lugs las ni /
translated: In their system,

original: thig bskor ba dang / 'gro ba dang / btang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o //
analyzed: thig bskor ba dang / 'gro ba dang / btang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o //
translated: the drawing of the lines, the circumambulation, the release, and so forth are also to be performed.

original: sa'i thig ni gzhung rgyas par gzhan du rtogs par sla bas bdag gis 'dir mi bsam mo //
analyzed: sa'i thig ni gzhung rgyas par gzhan du rtogs par sla bas bdag gis 'dir mi bsam mo //
translated: The earth line is easy to understand elsewhere in the extensive texts, so I will not consider it here.

original: ye shes kyi thig de ni aom a'a: h'um mu: bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi thig de ni aom a'a: h'um mu: bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: That wisdom line is requested to depart with oṃ āḥ hūṃ muḥ.

original: re zhig rgyud 'di nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
analyzed: re zhig rgyud 'di nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
translated: Now, with respect to this very tantra,

original: sa'i thig ji lta ba zhig yin pa cung zad dpyad de /
analyzed: sa'i thig ji lta ba zhig yin pa cung zad dpyad de /
translated: Having analyzed a little what the measurements of the ground are like,

original: de la 'di'i tshul ni /
analyzed: de la 'di'i tshul ni /
translated: the method here is as follows.

original: dkyil 'khor de'i tshad ji tsam ba la phyogs re re la yang cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang par bya zhing /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de'i tshad ji tsam ba la phyogs re re la yang cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang par bya zhing /
translated: The size of that maṇḍala is divided into one hundred parts in each direction.

original: de la rim pa gsum par bya'o //🔽de'i phyir / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
analyzed: de la rim pa gsum par bya'o // de'i phyir / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
translated: It is made into three sections.🔽Therefore,🔽the center maṇḍala is measured.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad kyi thig gdab pa'o //🔽chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽bslab pa gsum ston par byed pa'i lte ba dang / rtsibs rten dang / rtsibs @268a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad kyi thig gdab pa'o // chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la // zhes bya ba ni / bslab pa gsum ston par byed pa'i lte ba dang / rtsibs rten dang / rtsibs @268a * //
translated: The maṇḍala is drawn like a wheel.🔽The hub and the spokes

original: rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: are endowed with the three trainings.

original: de nyid gsal bar ba stan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar ba stan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to clarify that,

original: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la /
analyzed: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la /
translated: the hub and the sixteen spokes are endowed with three sections.

original: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The spokes are doubled.

original: lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang / rtsibs ni rim pa gsum mo //
analyzed: lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang / rtsibs ni rim pa gsum mo //
translated: The hub, the hub’s base, and the spokes are the three sections.

original: de dang ldan par bya ba ni bslab pa gsum mtshon pa yin pas so //
analyzed: de dang ldan par bya ba ni bslab pa gsum mtshon pa yin pas so //
translated: The three trainings are indicated by the possession of that.

original: rtsibs ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i lte ba la 'byar ba rtse mo zhum pa'o //
analyzed: rtsibs ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i lte ba la 'byar ba rtse mo zhum pa'o //
translated: The spokes are the tips of the spokes that are attached to the hub of the wheel.🔽The spokes should be made twice as small as the hub.

original: nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ba ni lte ba'i phyed kyi phyed la cha chung drug yod pa bas /
analyzed: nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ba ni lte ba'i phyed kyi phyed la cha chung drug yod pa bas /
translated: The hub is half of half of the hub, which is six small units.

original: nyis 'gyur te phyed kyis chung bar byas te /
analyzed: nyis 'gyur te phyed kyis chung bar byas te /
translated: The spokes are made twice as small as that, by half.

original: de bzhin du rtsibs rten kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsibs rten kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the spoke-supports are also made like that.

original: des na rtsibs rten dang rtsibs dag la /
analyzed: des na rtsibs rten dang rtsibs dag la /
translated: Therefore, the spoke-supports and spokes

original: cha chung gsum gsum gtang zhing /
analyzed: cha chung gsum gsum gtang zhing /
translated: should be abandoned by three small units each.

original: lte ba la cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lte ba la cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The hub should be abandoned by twenty-four small units. This is the meaning.

original: 'dir slob dpon kha cig na re lugs gzhan du /
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon kha cig na re lugs gzhan du /
translated: Here, some masters say that in another system,

original: dkyil 'khor nyis rim sum rim mam //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyis rim sum rim mam //
translated: the maṇḍala should be made in two, three,

original: bzhi'am mang por bya ba la //
analyzed: bzhi'am mang por bya ba la //
translated: four, or many layers.

original: phyi rim gang yin de la ni //
analyzed: phyi rim gang yin de la ni //
translated: In that outer layer,

original: sgo gcig pa dang rgya cher bya //🔽gzhan gyi phyogs kyi cha bzhin du //
analyzed: sgo gcig pa dang rgya cher bya //🔽gzhan gyi phyogs kyi cha bzhin du //
translated: it should be made with one door or extensive.

original: sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bya //
analyzed: sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bya //
translated: The four doors and door frames are made of that.

original: yang na thams cad dogs med par //
analyzed: yang na thams cad dogs med par //
translated: Or else, without any doubt,

original: sgo re re zhig bya ba yin //
analyzed: sgo re re zhig bya ba yin //
translated: each door is made of that.

original: snying po'i dkyil 'khor nges par ni //
analyzed: snying po'i dkyil 'khor nges par ni //
translated: The mandala of the essence is definitely

original: rab tu bzang por sgo bzhir bya //
analyzed: rab tu bzang por sgo bzhir bya //
translated: very good with four doors.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la brten pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la brten pas /
translated: Based on this statement,

original: rim pa gsum pa lung tha ma 'dod do //
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa lung tha ma 'dod do //
translated: the third stage is asserted to be the final transmission.

original: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni //
analyzed: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni //
translated: In the center, the all-knowing one,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so on,

original: ma lus par brjod zin mod kyi /
analyzed: ma lus par brjod zin mod kyi /
translated: have already been fully described.

original: rdul tshon gyi dbang du byas te yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rdul tshon gyi dbang du byas te yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: But it should be described again from the perspective of the colored powders.

original: de la 'di'i tshul ni /
analyzed: de la 'di'i tshul ni /
translated: The method for that is as follows:

original: rdul tshon ji srid du dgye bar 'dod pa'i sa'i cha la phyogs thams cad du cha chen po'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis gnas par re zhig de snyed kyi mtshan ma tsam gdab par bya'o //🔽de rnams re re la yang cha bar ma re re'i ri mo bya'o //
analyzed: rdul tshon ji srid du dgye bar 'dod pa'i sa'i cha la phyogs thams cad du cha chen po'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis gnas par re zhig de snyed kyi mtshan ma tsam gdab par bya'o // de rnams re re la yang cha bar ma re re'i ri mo bya'o //
translated: In the area of the ground as much as one wishes to spread the colored powders, in all directions, first place just that many marks of twenty-two large units.🔽In each of those, draw a line of each medium unit.

original: de rnams re re la yang cha chung re re'i ri mo bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams re re la yang cha chung re re'i ri mo bya ste /
translated: In each of those, draw a line of each small unit.

original: de ltar phyogs re re la yang cha chen po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / cha bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang / cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar phyogs re re la yang cha chen po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / cha bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang / cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, there are twenty-two major parts, forty-four intermediate parts, and ninety-six minor parts in each direction.

original: de yang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni cha chen po dgu'o //
analyzed: de yang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni cha chen po dgu'o //
translated: Moreover, the inner maṇḍala is nine major parts.

original: ri mo'i @268b sa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: ri mo'i @268b sa nas bzung ste /
translated: From the line of the picture

original: me 'od kyi bar du ni /
analyzed: me 'od kyi bar du ni /
translated: up to the firelight

original: cha chen po lnga dang cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: cha chen po lnga dang cha chung gcig go //
translated: is five major parts and one minor part.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor khor yug chen po dang bcas pa la ni /
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor khor yug chen po dang bcas pa la ni /
translated: The outer maṇḍala, together with the great enclosure,

original: cha chung bzhi dang yang cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: cha chung bzhi dang yang cha chung gcig go //
translated: is four minor parts and one minor part.

original: de la snying po la ni cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la snying po la ni cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste /
translated: Therein, the essence is twenty-four minor parts.

original: de nas cha chung gsum rtsibs rten du bskor zhing /
analyzed: de nas cha chung gsum rtsibs rten du bskor zhing /
translated: Then, three minor parts are set aside for the hub,

original: cha chung gsum la rtsibs bya'o //
analyzed: cha chung gsum la rtsibs bya'o //
translated: and three minor parts are set aside for the spokes.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
translated: The center maṇḍala is drawn

original: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la //
translated: like the wheel of the Dharma,🔽with a hub and sixteen spokes,

original: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
translated: endowed with three layers.

original: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
analyzed: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
translated: The spokes are doubled.

original: zhes gsungs te sngar bzhin du dpyad do //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te sngar bzhin du dpyad do //
translated: Analyze as before.

original: de nas cha chung gcig la rdo rje phreng bas khor yug chung du ltar bskor ro //
analyzed: de nas cha chung gcig la rdo rje phreng bas khor yug chung du ltar bskor ro //
translated: Then, with a vajra garland, draw the small circumambulation walkway, one small unit in size, as before.

original: de'i ri mo phyi ma la gru chad byas la /
analyzed: de'i ri mo phyi ma la gru chad byas la /
translated: On the outer line of that, make a square.

original: dbus su sgo dang phyi rol gyi sgo khyud bcas pa la zheng du cha chen po gsum spyin te /
analyzed: dbus su sgo dang phyi rol gyi sgo khyud bcas pa la zheng du cha chen po gsum spyin te /
translated: In the center, give three large units in width for the door and the outer door frame.🔽Then,

original: de nas / dgu yi char ni bgos pa la //
analyzed: de nas / dgu yi char ni bgos pa la //
translated: divide it into nine parts.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya // zhes gsungs te /
translated: The door and door frame are one third.🔽Analyze this in detail as before.

original: sngar zhib tu dpyad de de de yang ri mo'i sa cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: sngar zhib tu dpyad de de de yang ri mo'i sa cha chung gcig go //
translated: That is one small unit of the area for the lines.

original: de nas khyams la cha bar ma gcig ste /
analyzed: de nas khyams la cha bar ma gcig ste /
translated: Then, the portico is one medium unit.

original: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
analyzed: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
translated: The pediments are on all the porticoes.

original: byams pa la sogs mchog chen rnams //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs mchog chen rnams //
translated: The great beings Maitreya and so forth

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽de nas rin po che'i rtsig pa la cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so // de nas rin po che'i rtsig pa la cha chung gcig go //
translated: are described.🔽Then, the jeweled wall is one small unit.

original: de'i phyi rol du dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa la cha bar ma gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa la cha bar ma gcig go //
translated: Outside of that, the latticework and half-latticework are one medium unit.

original: de'i phyi rol du mda' yab la cha chung gcig go //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du mda' yab la cha chung gcig go //
translated: Outside of that, on the parapet, there is one small unit.

original: de nas cha chung dor ba'i cha chen po gcig la rta babs te /
analyzed: de nas cha chung dor ba'i cha chen po gcig la rta babs te /
translated: Then, having subtracted one small unit, there is one large unit for the pediment.

original: bang rim tha ma la cha chen po gsum las lhag ma la re re bri'o //
analyzed: bang rim tha ma la cha chen po gsum las lhag ma la re re bri'o //
translated: On the lowest step, there are three large units. The rest are drawn with one each.

original: de nas cha chung bzhi la 'khor lo dang gdugs dag go //
analyzed: de nas cha chung bzhi la 'khor lo dang gdugs dag go //
translated: Then, for four small units, there is the wheel and the parasol.

original: de nas de'i phyi rol du shin tu nye bar ma yin par me 'od dang padma dang rdo rje cha gsum mo //
analyzed: de nas de'i phyi rol du shin tu nye bar ma yin par me 'od dang padma dang rdo rje cha gsum mo //
translated: Then, outside of that, not too close, there is the three-part vajra of firelight and lotus.

original: de nas cha chung bzhi po rim pa re re'o //
analyzed: de nas cha chung bzhi po rim pa re re'o //
translated: Then, for four small units, there are the steps.

original: des na cha chung gcig la khor yug chen po'o //
analyzed: des na cha chung gcig la khor yug chen po'o //
translated: Then, for one small unit, there is the great outer enclosure.

original: ka ba yang dbus dang mthar cha chung re re la'o //🔽sgo'i zheng du cha chung drug go //
analyzed: ka ba yang dbus dang mthar cha chung re re la'o // sgo'i zheng du cha chung drug go //
translated: The pillars are in the center and at the end, one small unit each.🔽The width of the door is six small units.

original: phyi'i sgo khyud kyi cha chung drug go //
analyzed: phyi'i sgo khyud kyi cha chung drug go //
translated: The outer door lintel is six small units.

original: dbu ma'i dbu mar cha chung brgyang do //
analyzed: dbu ma'i dbu mar cha chung brgyang do //
translated: In the center of the center, there is one small unit.

original: de ltar mtshan ma la zhi par dpyad de /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma la zhi par dpyad de /
translated: Thus, having analyzed the signs,

original: ma 'khrul ba ltar na tshangs thig dang / de nas phyogs thig dang / de nas @269a * //
analyzed: ma 'khrul ba ltar na tshangs thig dang / de nas phyogs thig dang / de nas @269a * //
translated: If one is not confused, one should draw the Brahma line, then the directional lines, then the intermediate directions, and then the four doors.🔽

original: zur thig dang / de nas ma lus bar dbus nas gdab bo //
analyzed: zur thig dang / de nas ma lus bar dbus nas gdab bo //
translated: If one is not confused, one should first lay down the central line, then the directional lines, then the corner lines, and then all the remaining lines from the center.

original: de ltar thig btab nas rdul tshon dgye ba ba stan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar thig btab nas rdul tshon dgye ba ba stan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having laid down the lines in that way, in order to teach the pouring of the colored powders,

original: dbus kyi phyogs su zhes bya ba nas yang na ming yang rung zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
analyzed: dbus kyi phyogs su zhes bya ba nas yang na ming yang rung zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “In the center” up to “or even the name.”

original: khro bo ni gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: khro bo ni gshin rje gshed do //
translated: “Angry” is Yamāntaka.

original: mngags pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //
analyzed: mngags pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //
translated: “Messenger” is Aparājitā.

original: pho nya ni rta mgrin no //
analyzed: pho nya ni rta mgrin no //
translated: “Messenger” is Hayagrīva.

original: sogs zhes bya ba ni bran zhes bya ba 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: sogs zhes bya ba ni bran zhes bya ba 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: “Etc.” is the servant, the noble Acala.

original: de las gzhan gyi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin te //
analyzed: de las gzhan gyi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin te //
translated: The meaning of the other words has been explained previously.

original: de la dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rdul tshon dgye ba ji lta bu yin pa 'dir lung la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rdul tshon dgye ba ji lta bu yin pa 'dir lung la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: Here, in order to engage the scriptures, one should ask, “What is the pouring of the colored powders of the maṇḍalas?”

original: dkyil 'khor bdag gi cho ga ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag gi cho ga ni //
translated: The ritual of the maṇḍala

original: rnam pa gsum po ma lus pa //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum po ma lus pa //
translated: is the complete three types.

analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

original: 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /
analyzed: 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /

analyzed: thal spyar mchod yon blos mchod dang // cho ga'i yan lag nyid dang bzhi //

analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de /

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /

analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal spyar dang // de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang // me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i //

original: sor mo las byung me tog rnams //
analyzed: sor mo las byung me tog rnams //

original: skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya // zhes gsungs so //

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag tu ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag tu ni /
translated: And, from the perspective of the yoga tantras,

analyzed: mchod pa rab tu mang po dag ba stan te /
translated: many offerings are taught.🔽The Origin of the Goddess Kurukulla

original: lha mo ku ru kulle 'byung ba las ni /
analyzed: lha mo ku ru kulle 'byung ba las ni /
translated: says:

original: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa bco brgyang gsungs so //
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa bco brgyang gsungs so //

original: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus par ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus par ni /

analyzed: mchod pa phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang rab tu gsang ba rnams ba stan te /

analyzed: de bas na mchod pa rnams ni sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rab tu mang mod kyi /

analyzed: 'dir ni mchod pa dgu yan chad dang bcas pa'o //

original: de yang ji skad bshad pa'i yon chab thogs te /
analyzed: de yang ji skad bshad pa'i yon chab thogs te /
translated: Moreover, holding the previously explained water for the feet,

analyzed: aom badzra aargham pra t'i tstsha @276b a'a: h'um zhes pas dbul lo //

analyzed: mchod yon ni sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzung ste dbul lo //

analyzed: de yang dang po phyug bzhi byas la /

original: de nas mchod yon dbul te /
analyzed: de nas mchod yon dbul te /

analyzed: rab tu mang zhing mchog tu bya ba dang / ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dzny'a n'a lo ka ka ri h'um phat /

original: rab tu rgyas par tshim par bsam mo //
analyzed: rab tu rgyas par tshim par bsam mo //

original: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste /

analyzed: aom badzra satva su sang+gra ha /

analyzed: aom badzra ratna ma nutta ram /

original: aom badzra dharma g'a ya ne /
analyzed: aom badzra dharma g'a ya ne /

analyzed: aom badzra karma ka rongbha be zhes glur blang ngo //
translated: Oṃ vajra karma karo bhava.

analyzed: de nas rdo rje khu chur gnyis kyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor phreng ba 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar smon pas //

analyzed: aom badzra m'a le zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //

analyzed: de nas 'gro ba thams cad la mdo sde zab mo la sogs pa bshad pa 'byung ba yid la smon pas /

analyzed: rdo rje khu chur gnyis rang gi kha nas tshig 'thon pa ltar byas te /

analyzed: aom badzra g'i ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //

analyzed: de nas yang rdo rje gang gyi tshul gyis thal mo spyi bor spyar te /

analyzed: 'gro ba la nges pa'i tshig tu chos ston pa @277a * //

analyzed: dang ; spyod lam sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don la mkhas par gyur cig ces smos pas /

analyzed: aom badzra nri ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //

original: yang na dang po yon chab phul la /
analyzed: yang na dang po yon chab phul la /

original: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de /
analyzed: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de /

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa de dag gi yon tan yang /
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa de dag gi yon tan yang /

analyzed: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las / rdo rje 'dzom byas nas kyang //

analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing // de nas rdo rje glur blangs la //

analyzed: rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas nas //

original: bde ba gzhan ni yod min te //
analyzed: bde ba gzhan ni yod min te //

original: de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med //
analyzed: de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med //

original: ces gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: de nas bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa yang rung ngo //

analyzed: aom aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbul lo //

original: sngar bshad pa'i yon chab ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pas dbul lo //🔽aom sarba bid pu ra pu ra aa brta ya ho zhes 'don cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcings la /

original: rta babs la sogs pa dbul lo //
analyzed: rta babs la sogs pa dbul lo //
translated: Reciting Oṃ sarva-vid pūra pūra avarta-ya HŪṃ, form the mudra of the sky treasury and offer the archways and so forth.

original: gal te mchod pa rnams dngos su ma 'byor na /
analyzed: gal te mchod pa rnams dngos su ma 'byor na /

analyzed: de'i tshe mchod pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams gro ga la sogs pa la bris te /

analyzed: dngos yin par lhag par mos bar mchod yon tsam du dbul lo //
translated: With the thought that they are real, offer just the water for drinking.

original: de ltar ni 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /

original: che ge mo 'de bzhes shig ces //
analyzed: che ge mo 'de bzhes shig ces //

original: rdzas kyi ming nas phyung ste dbul //
analyzed: rdzas kyi ming nas phyung ste dbul //

original: ma 'byor na yang gzugs brnyan rnams //
analyzed: ma 'byor na yang gzugs brnyan rnams //
translated: If you do not have the articles,

original: byas nas mchod yon dbul bar bya //
analyzed: byas nas mchod yon dbul bar bya //
translated: make images and offer them.

original: sngags dang mchod pa phul ba yi //
analyzed: sngags dang mchod pa phul ba yi //
translated: The mantra and the offering

original: cho ga thams cad tshogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: cho ga thams cad tshogs par 'gyur //
translated: will be the complete ritual.

original: zhes gsung so //
analyzed: zhes gsung so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa tsam yid kyis mchod pa dang bcas nas mchod pa yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa tsam yid kyis mchod pa dang bcas nas mchod pa yang /
translated: Likewise, having made offerings to the extent of your resources, together with mental offerings,

original: de nyid las /
analyzed: de nyid las /
translated: the same text says:

original: rnam pa kun la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: rnam pa kun la mkhas pa yis //
translated: The wise one in all aspects

original: rtag tu ci 'byor pas kyang rung //

translated: with a mind full of faith.🔽To the Rākṣasas, Piśācas,🔽and Bhūtas who eat raw flesh,

original: srin po rnams dang sha za dang // 'byung po sha rjen za ba dang // sems can rnam pa sna tshogs @281a * //
analyzed: srin po rnams dang sha za dang // 'byung po sha rjen za ba dang // sems can rnam pa sna tshogs @281a * //
translated: and to various kinds of beings,

original: la ; / mkhas pas gtor ma gtong bar bya //
analyzed: la ; / mkhas pas gtor ma gtong bar bya //
translated: the wise one should offer the bali.

original: blo las gang dang gang dran pa //
analyzed: blo las gang dang gang dran pa //
translated: Whatever is thought of by the mind,

original: de na gnas pa'i sems can ni //
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i sems can ni //
translated: the beings who dwell there,

original: ljon shing gel ba la gnas pa //
analyzed: ljon shing gel ba la gnas pa //
translated: And to the trees and shrubs,

original: de dang de la rab tu spyin //🔽dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dra ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de dang de la rab tu spyin // dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dra ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Scattering them here and there.🔽In the northeast, Rudra, svāhā!

original: dbang po'i phyogs su sha kra ye sv'a h'a /🔽me'i phyogs su aagna ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dbang po'i phyogs su sha kra ye sv'a h'a / me'i phyogs su aagna ye sv'a h'a /
translated: In the southeast, Śakra, svāhā!🔽In the south, Agni, svāhā!

original: gshin rje'i phyogs su ba ya bee ya sva ta ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs su ba ya bee ya sva ta ye sv'a h'a /
translated: In the southwest, Yama, svāhā!

original: srin po'i phyogs su r'aksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /🔽chu'i phyogs su me ka da sha na ye sv'a h'a /🔽rlung gi phyogs su ba ya be sv'a h'a /
analyzed: srin po'i phyogs su r'aksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a / chu'i phyogs su me ka da sha na ye sv'a h'a / rlung gi phyogs su ba ya be sv'a h'a /
translated: In the west, Rākṣasa, svāhā!🔽In the northwest, Varuṇa, svāhā!

original: lus ngan gyi phyogs su yaksha bidya dha ra ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: lus ngan gyi phyogs su yaksha bidya dha ra ya sv'a h'a /
translated: In the north, Yakṣa, svāhā!

original: srin po rnams la kram ka re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: srin po rnams la kram ka re sv'a h'a /
translated: To the Rākṣasas, kram kare svāhā!

original: sha za rnams la pi tsi pi tsi sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sha za rnams la pi tsi pi tsi sv'a h'a /
translated: To the Piśācas, pi ci pi ci svāhā!

original: 'byung po rnams la gung gung sv'a h'a /
analyzed: 'byung po rnams la gung gung sv'a h'a /
translated: To the Bhūtas, gu gu gu svāhā!

original: kun du  gtor ma byin nas ni //🔽lag pa legs par bkrus nas su //
analyzed: kun du  gtor ma byin nas ni // lag pa legs par bkrus nas su //
translated: Having offered the bali all around,🔽Thoroughly wash your hands,

original: nye reg tshul bzhin byas nas ni //
analyzed: nye reg tshul bzhin byas nas ni //
translated: And perform the proper ablutions.

original: de nas nang du 'jug par bya //
analyzed: de nas nang du 'jug par bya //
translated: Then enter inside.

original: zhes so // yang na 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phyi rol du khyer la /
analyzed: zhes so // yang na 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phyi rol du khyer la /
translated: Or else, one should take outside the bali for all the bhūta spirits.

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am aadya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes sgra chen po lan gsum brjod la /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am aadya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes sgra chen po lan gsum brjod la /
translated: Then, one should recite three times the great sound of the mantra of Akāśagarbha, “Oṃ akarṣa mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāta āṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā,”

original: 'gro ba thams cad la bsngos te gtor ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la bsngos te gtor ro //
translated: and dedicate it to all beings and cast it out.

original: yang na lugs 'dis gtor ma spyin te /
analyzed: yang na lugs 'dis gtor ma spyin te /
translated: Or else, one should give the bali according to this system.

original: dang por mandala zlum po khru gang yan chad bcu phyogs brgyang du byed du bcug la /
analyzed: dang por mandala zlum po khru gang yan chad bcu phyogs brgyang du byed du bcug la /
translated: First, one should have a round maṇḍala made, at least one cubit in size, and smeared with white sandalwood.

original: mandala re re'i steng du gtor ma sngar bshad pa bzhag la /
analyzed: mandala re re'i steng du gtor ma sngar bshad pa bzhag la /
translated: On each maṇḍala, one should place the bali as previously explained.

original: de nas dang por spyan drangs ste /
analyzed: de nas dang por spyan drangs ste /
translated: Then, first, one should invite the deities.

original: de nas dam tshig ba stan cing mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig ba stan cing mchod yon phul te /
translated: Then, one should establish the pledge beings, offer water for welcoming,

original: dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang / mar me dang byug pa phul la aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs par shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gtor la /
analyzed: dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang / mar me dang byug pa phul la aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs par shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gtor la /
translated: offer perfume, flowers, incense, lamps, and perfume, and offer the three ejections beginning in the east with “a ka ro” and so on.

original: yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gtang ngo //
analyzed: yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gtang ngo //
translated: Again, one should offer water for welcoming and so on, and send them back.

original: de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams yin te /🔽shar phyogs su kha bltas te /
analyzed: de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams yin te / shar phyogs su kha bltas te /
translated: The mantras and gestures for these are as follows.🔽Facing the east,

original: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas ;🔽lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya la /
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas ; lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya la /
translated: one should sit in the manner of stretching out the right leg,🔽and with the left hand in the vajra gesture,

original: g-yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur logs su bzhag ste /
analyzed: g-yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur logs su bzhag ste /
translated: one should place the right hand in the vajra gesture on the hip,

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: and with the right index finger in the hook gesture, one should summon Indra. This is the gesture for summoning Indra.

original: de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni /
analyzed: de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni /
translated: If one does not make the index finger into a hook,

original: brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: this is the pledge seal of Indra.

original: rgang pa g-yon @281b brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
analyzed: rgang pa g-yon @281b brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
translated: One should sit in the manner of stretching out the left leg,

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las /
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las /
translated: and from the gesture for summoning,

original: mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: one should extend the index finger. This is the gesture for sending away.🔽Then, his mantra is:

original: de nas 'di'i sngags ni na mo badzra sa tsa di shi badzra p'a ni raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: de nas 'di'i sngags ni na mo badzra sa tsa di shi badzra p'a ni raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
translated: namaḥ vajra-śacī-vajrāṇi rakṣa rakṣa svāhā.

original: me'i phyogs su kha bltas nas /
analyzed: me'i phyogs su kha bltas nas /
translated: Facing the south,

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
translated: The index finger of the right hand is bent into a circle

original: gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la /
analyzed: gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la /
translated: and placed at the third joint of the middle finger.

original: mthe bo lag mthil du gzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo lag mthil du gzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The thumb is placed in the palm of the hand. This is the mudrā for summoning the fire god.

original: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni /
analyzed: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni /
translated: From the summoning mudrā, the thumb is placed on the index finger.

original: me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge mudrā of the fire god.

original: phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te myir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te myir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In that very mudrā, the index finger is placed on the thumb, and the hand is extended forcefully. This is the mudrā for sending away.

original: de'i sngags ni aagne aa ha ka pa li dzva la dzva la /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni aagne aa ha ka pa li dzva la dzva la /
translated: His mantra is: “Agni, ah, kapāli, jvālā, jvālā,

original: da ha ni khi tho li bi r'u p'a ksha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: da ha ni khi tho li bi r'u p'a ksha sv'a h'a /
translated: dahani, khattoli, vīrupāka, svāhā.

original: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste /🔽sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur ba cangs nas /
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste / sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur ba cangs nas /
translated: “Looking in the direction of Yama, one should place the cupped hands in front of oneself,🔽interlocking the fingers and making fists,🔽and raising up the two ring fingers,

original: srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g-yabs te /
analyzed: srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g-yabs te /
translated: placing them side by side and waving them.

original: nang du gzhug pa ni gshin rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: nang du gzhug pa ni gshin rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the mudrā for summoning Yama.

original: srin lag gnyis phyi rol du shin tu gshibs te bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: srin lag gnyis phyi rol du shin tu gshibs te bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The samaya mudra is to extend the two ring fingers straight out, side by side, and place them at the heart.

original: 'di nyid las srin lag spyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid las srin lag spyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The dismissal mudra is to separate the ring fingers from that mudra.

original: sngags ni sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is samaya svāhā.

original: bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang ba mnyam par 'dug la /🔽lag pa g-yas kyi khu tshur ba cangs pa las /🔽mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs la bsgreng ste gzhag / lag pa g-yon pa 'ang de ltar byas te sta zur phyogs su bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g-yab pa ni bden bral dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang ba mnyam par 'dug la / lag pa g-yas kyi khu tshur ba cangs pa las / mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs la bsgreng ste gzhag / lag pa g-yon pa 'ang de ltar byas te sta zur phyogs su bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g-yab pa ni bden bral dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the direction of the southwest, stand with the feet together.🔽Make a fist with the right hand🔽and extend the index and middle fingers together like a sword.🔽The mudra for summoning Nairṛtī is to place the left hand in the same way at the hip and wave the left index finger.

original: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The samaya mudra of Nairṛtī is to place the left hand at the hip like a sword from that mudra.

original: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudrā of summoning is the same as the mudrā of summoning, except that the index finger is extended.

original: sngags ni sarba bhuddha ba ya ka ya ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni sarba bhuddha ba ya ka ya ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is “Oṃ, you who delight all buddhas, do this!

original: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la /
analyzed: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la /
translated: “In the direction of Varuṇa, one should sit with the feet together.

original: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs la mthe bo dang / mdzub mo gcig tu spyar la /🔽zhags mig @282a * //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs la mthe bo dang / mdzub mo gcig tu spyar la / zhags mig @282a * //
translated: The right hand should be clenched into a fist with the thumb and index finger joined together.

original: ltar byas te g-yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas la snying gar bzhag ste /🔽g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa ni dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //🔽phyag rgya de nyid la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ltar byas te g-yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas la snying gar bzhag ste / g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa ni dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o // phyag rgya de nyid la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The left hand should be in the same way, placed at the heart.🔽The index finger of the left hand should be made like a hook. This is the mudrā of summoning.🔽The same mudrā, with the index finger of the left hand placed in the manner of a fist, is the pledge mudrā of Varuṇa.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo slar btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo slar btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudrā of dismissing is the same as the previous mudrā, except that the index finger is extended.🔽“

original: sngags ni ti ti ba ti ti ti shi khi tu li bi r'u p'aksha ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni ti ti ba ti ti ti shi khi tu li bi r'u p'aksha ya sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is: “ti ti va ti ti ti śi khi tu li vi rūpā kṣaya svāhā.”

original: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
analyzed: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
translated: One should stand facing the direction of Vāyu,

original: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur ba cangs te /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur ba cangs te /
translated: make a fist with the left hand,

original: gung mo bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to btsugs la lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du byas te /
analyzed: gung mo bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to btsugs la lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du byas te /
translated: raise the middle finger, and with the right hand do the same,

original: sta zur logs su gzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sta zur logs su gzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: placing it on the shoulder, and move the thumb—this is the mudrā for summoning Vāyu.

original: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that very mudrā, placing the thumb as before is the pledge mudrā of Vāyu.

original: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the summoning mudrā, extending the thumb is the mudrā for dismissing.

original: sngags ni aom sva sa kha kha kha khu khu khu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni aom sva sa kha kha kha khu khu khu sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is: “oṃ svāsa kha kha khakhu khakhu svāhā.”

original: lus ngan la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo spyar la rdo rje bcing pa nang du bzlog ste /
analyzed: lus ngan la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo spyar la rdo rje bcing pa nang du bzlog ste /
translated: Facing Kubera, one should stand with the two hands in añjali, reverse the vajra bond,

original: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang ;
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang ;
translated: The two little fingers are extended side by side.

original: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis de ltar bkug ste g-yab pa ni lus ngan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis de ltar bkug ste g-yab pa ni lus ngan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Behind that, the two ring fingers are placed separately, and the two middle fingers are bent like that and waved. This is the mudrā for summoning Kuvera.

original: phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni /
translated: From that very mudrā, the two middle fingers are placed inside in the manner of a vajra bond.

original: lus ngan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lus ngan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the pledge mudrā of Kuvera.

original: 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the summoning mudrā, extending the two middle fingers is the mudrā for sending away.

original: sngags ni ku bi r'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni ku bi r'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is kuverāya svāhā.

original: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
translated: Facing the northeast,

original: lag pa thal mo gcig tu spyar ba byas la /
analyzed: lag pa thal mo gcig tu spyar ba byas la /
translated: one should join the palms together

original: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol /
analyzed: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol /
translated: and bend the ring fingers and little fingers inside, crossing them.

original: gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya /
analyzed: gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya /
translated: The two middle fingers are extended side by side, and behind them the two index fingers are made like a vajra.

original: mthe bong gnyis bar du gshibs te bzhag la /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis bar du gshibs te bzhag la /
translated: The two thumbs are placed together in between.

original: de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: For that very [mudra], the two index fingers touch at the tips and are shaken inside—this is the mudra for summoning Indra.

original: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i @282b tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i @282b tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: For that very [mudra], the index fingers are placed like a vajra as before—this is the pledge mudra of Indra.

original: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From the summoning mudra, extending the index fingers is the mudra for dismissing.

original: sngags ni dzrum dzrum shi ba sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sngags ni dzrum dzrum shi ba sv'a h'a /
translated: The mantra is jrum jrum śivā svāhā.

original: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug pas /
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug pas /
translated: Seated in the posture of the extended left leg,

original: lag pa thal mo khong stong du spyar te bzhag la /
analyzed: lag pa thal mo khong stong du spyar te bzhag la /
translated: the palms are joined hollow and placed above the head.

original: steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus tshangs pa la sogs pa dgug par bya'o //
